requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10x64 (64-bit OS Required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 (4th gen) or equivalent AMD processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • Storage: 1.5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11.0 compatible sound card
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10x64 (64-bit OS Required) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 (6th generation or newer) or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated GPU (Intel UHD 620 or better)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11.0 compatible sound card
